actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to make improvements to the Arctic Research and Policy Act of 1984.
short_title: Arctic Research and Policy Amendments Act of 2007

summary.text: Arctic Research and Policy Amendments Act of 2007 - Amends the Arctic Research and Policy Act of 1984 to increase the number of days per year the chairperson of the Arctic Research Commission shall be compensated for serving as a member of the Commission.

titles.title: Arctic Research and Policy Amendments Act of 2007
A bill to make improvements to the Arctic Research and Policy Act of 1984.
